name: Nyein Ka Lay
greetingText: I love u more than u know!
wishText: With every sunrise, our love renews, paints the sky with hues of gold. In your eyes, a promise, forever true, a story waiting to unfold. We dance in the rhythm of your heart, each beat a language we both comprehend, with every tear, every laugh, our love transcends, Happy Valentine's Day, my emotional ka lay lay.
